markdownRemark.html: Onspain is a Spanish School in Malaga located in two beautiful houses at Pedregalejo and at street Trinidad Grund. This is a school where you can learn Spanish at various levels, for groups and individuals. The school is an accredited center of the Instituto Cervantes and offers a database of host families they have been working with for years that provides accommodation.

frontmatter.title: OnSpain School

This is a school where you can learn Spanish at various levels, for groups and individuals. The school is an accredited center of the Instituto Cervantes and offers a database of host families they have been working with for years that provides accommodation.
